Privacy Policy

Last updated: 2025-11-30

We value the privacy of our users. This page summarizes what we may collect and how we use it.

What we may collect

  • Usage data and analytics for improving the product
  • Uploaded files and metadata when you use the upload / analysis features
  • Contact details you provide when sending feedback or support requests

How we use information

We use collected data to improve features, diagnose issues, analyze usage, and respond to support requests. We do not sell your personal information.

Contact

For privacy concerns or to request data deletion, contact: help.retrorate@gmail.com
